price: 4. (He) Who has fed them against hunger, and has made them safe from fear.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
